title: The In-between Stage (Ever-Presence, #1).
description: "He seemed normal. I wasn’t afraid of him. And there was something, I didn’t know what it was, but I couldn’t kill him, there was… more to him, more that I craved to figure out, but, if he didn’t leave, like I’d instructed him to do, his fate would be imminent…"When orphan Selena Resse is adopted by a strange couple who live in the middle of nowhere, she begins to question why they would live so far from civilization. She soon discovers that her adopted parents are not who they appear to be and a turn of events put her and the people around her in danger.
author: Katelin M. Ballinger
